channel.title: Looping [Simple Help]

item.title: Looping [Simple Help]
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

How would I turn this into a loop?

addItem(995, 150000); addItem(1725, 1); addItem(1023, 1); addItem(882, 250); addItem(1153, 1); addItem(1115, 1); addItem(1067, 1); addItem(1323, 1); addItem(1129, 1); addItem(1095, 1); addItem(1063, 1); addItem(841, 1); addItem(579, 1); addItem(577, 1); addItem(1011, 1); addItem(1381, 1); addItem(556, 300); addItem(555, 250); addItem(557, 250); addItem(554, 250); addItem(558, 250); addItem(559, 100);

Read full topic
